content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Step fearlessly into the heart of combat as Captain Titus of the Ultramarines, unleashing visible violent death against the enemies of mankind in the first 3rd person action shooter set in the dark future of the Warhammer 40,000 universe. Form your own Space Marine squad or Chaos Space Marine warband and take the battle online. The Warhammer® 40,000®: Space Marine® Ultimate Edition includes the full game and all content previously available in the following DLC packs: BLOOD RAVEN'S ARMOUR PACK, EMPEROR'S ELITE PACK, GOLDEN RELIC BOLTER, GOLDEN RELIC CHAINSWORD, TRAITOR LEGIONS PACK, ALPHA LEGION CHAPTER SKIN, BLOOD ANGELS CHAPTER SKIN, CHAOS UNLEASHED, LEGION OF THE DAMNED, SALAMANDERS CHAPTER SKIN, DEATH GUARD CHAMPION SKIN, DREADNOUGHT ASSAULT, IRON HANDS VETERAN SKIN.

1 player
285KB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i, 1080p
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Features
Network Players 2-16

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and this item's use restrictions. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
